mainText:
Thank You Steve for my MacBook Pro.
I was a PC user for many years, but since last year I changed to Mac
and now, I love it. It's  the best computer ever. Thank you for your
passion and your efforts, your legacy will live forever in our lives.
See you in heaven, dear Steve, create iPads there too :)
header: Thank u for my Macbook Pro
author: Pamela
